# Main Menu

## File
<!-- Object: File1 -->
Contains file-related operations for managing projects and units in the SCXML editor.

### New Project
![action_image_3](data:image/bmp;base64,)
New Project  
**Shortcut**: `Ctrl+N`  
<!-- Object: Newproject1 | Shortcut: 16462 = 16384 (Ctrl) + 78 (N) -->
<!-- Action: actNewProj -->

### New Unit
![action_image_27](data:image/bmp;base64,)
New Unit  
**Shortcut**: `Shift+Ctrl+N`  
<!-- Object: NewUnit1 | Shortcut: 24654 = 24576 (Shift+Ctrl) + 78 (N) -->
<!-- Action: actNewUnit -->

### Open Project
![action_image_114](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Open Project  
**Shortcut**: `Ctrl+O`  
<!-- Object: Open3 | Shortcut: 16463 = 16384 (Ctrl) + 79 (O) -->
<!-- Action: actOpenProject -->

### Open Unit
![action_image_116](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Open unit  
**Shortcut**: `Shift+Ctrl+O`  
<!-- Object: Openunit1 | Shortcut: 24655 = 24576 (Shift+Ctrl) + 79 (O) -->
<!-- Action: actOpenUnit -->

### Build
![action_image_51](data:image/bmp;base64,)

**Shortcut**: `Ctrl+B`  
<!-- Object: Build2 | Shortcut: 16450 = 16384 (Ctrl) + 66 (B) -->
<!-- Action: actBuildProject -->

### Add Unit
![action_image_0](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Add Unit  
<!-- Object: AddUnit1 -->
<!-- Action: actAddUnit -->

### Add Existing Unit
![action_image_1](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Add Existing Unit  
<!-- Object: AddExistingUnit1 -->
<!-- Action: actAddExisting -->

### Remove Unit
![action_image_13](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Remove Unit  
<!-- Object: Removeunit1 -->
<!-- Action: actRemoveUnit -->

### Close
![action_image_17](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Close unit  
**Shortcut**: `Ctrl+W`  
<!-- Object: Close2 | Shortcut: 16471 = 16384 (Ctrl) + 87 (W) -->
<!-- Action: actClose -->

### Close All
![action_image_12](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Close all (project and units)  
**Shortcut**: `Shift+Ctrl+W`  
<!-- Object: ActionCloseProject1 | Shortcut: 24663 = 24576 (Shift+Ctrl) + 87 (W) -->
<!-- Action: actCloseAll -->

### Revert
![action_image_112](data:image/bmp;base64,)

**Shortcut**: `Shift+Alt+W`  
<!-- Object: Revert1 | Shortcut: 41047 = 40960 (Shift+Alt) + 87 (W) -->
<!-- Action: actRevert -->

### Save Project As...
![action_image_9](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Save Project As  
<!-- Object: SaveProjectAs1 -->
<!-- Action: actSaveProjectAs -->

### Save Unit
![action_image_62](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Save Unit  
**Shortcut**: `Ctrl+S`  
<!-- Object: Save1 | Shortcut: 16467 = 16384 (Ctrl) + 83 (S) -->
<!-- Action: actSave -->

### Save Unit As...
![action_image_7](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Save Unit As  
<!-- Object: SaveAs1 -->
<!-- Action: actSaveAs -->

### Save All
![action_image_57](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Save all (project and units)  
**Shortcut**: `Shift+Ctrl+S`  
<!-- Object: Open2 | Shortcut: 24659 = 24576 (Shift+Ctrl) + 83 (S) -->
<!-- Action: actSaveAll -->

### Force Save All Opened
![action_image_105](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Force Save All Opened  
Saves all opened files and project even if it seems to have no changes  
<!-- Object: ForceSaveAllOpened -->
<!-- Action: actForceSaveAllOpened -->

### Force Save All
![action_image_86](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Force Save All  
Saves all files and project even if it seems to have no changes  
<!-- Object: ForceSaveAll -->
<!-- Action: actForceSaveAll -->

### Save flat
![action_image_6](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Save flat  
<!-- Object: Saveflat1 -->
<!-- Action: actSaveFlat -->

### Import states configuration
![action_image_78](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Open|Opens active states configuration  
<!-- Object: Importstatesconfiguration1 -->
<!-- Action: actImportConfiguration -->

### Export
<!-- Object: Export1 -->
Provides options to export the SCXML project in various formats.

#### Export as raw scxml
<!-- Object: Exporttorawscxml1 -->
Export as raw scxml  
<!-- Action: actExportToRawScxml -->

#### Export as HPP
<!-- Object: ExporttoHPP1 -->
Export as HPP  
<!-- Action: actExportToHPP -->

#### Export as DFM
<!-- Object: ExporttoPas1 -->
Export as DFM  
<!-- Action: actExportToDFM -->

#### Export as ANSI C
<!-- Object: ExportasANSIC1 -->
Transform SCXML to ANSI C file  
<!-- Action: actExportAnsiC -->

#### Export using 'qscxmlc'
<!-- Object: Exportusingqscxmlc1 -->
Compile SCXML by 'qscxmlc'  
<!-- Action: actExportQt -->

#### Export as graph DOT
<!-- Object: ExportasgraphDOT1 -->
Export as graph DOT  
<!-- Action: actExportGraphDot -->

#### Export as graph DOT + Png
<!-- Object: ExportasgraphDOTPng1 -->
Export as graph DOT + Png  
<!-- Action: actExportGraphDotPlusPng -->

#### Export as SVG
<!-- Object: ExportasSVG1 -->
Export as SVG  
<!-- Action: actExportSVG -->

#### Export as Qt Creator Scxml
<!-- Object: ExportasQtCreatorScxml1 -->
Save file with Qt Creator visual metainformation  
<!-- Action: actExportAsQtCreatorScxml -->

#### Export as VSCode Scxml
<!-- Object: ExportasVSCodeScxml1 -->
<!-- Action: actExportAsVSCodeScxml -->

#### Export as ScxmlGui
<!-- Object: ExportasScxmlGui1 -->
Save file with ScxmlGui visual metainformation  
<!-- Action: actExportAsScxmlGui -->

#### Export as Simple Visual Scxml
<!-- Object: ExportasSimpleVisualScxml1 -->
<!-- Action: actExportAsSimpleScxml -->

## Edit
<!-- Object: MenuEdit -->
Contains editing and search-related operations.

### Search
![action_image_29](data:image/bmp;base64,)

**Shortcut**: `Ctrl+F`  
<!-- Object: Search1 | Shortcut: 16454 = 16384 (Ctrl) + 70 (F) -->
<!-- Action: actSearch -->

### Search All
![action_image_89](data:image/bmp;base64,)

**Shortcut**: `Shift+Ctrl+F`  
<!-- Object: SearchAll1 | Shortcut: 24646 = 24576 (Shift+Ctrl) + 70 (F) -->
<!-- Action: actSearchAll -->

### Clear clipboard connections
![action_image_67](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Clear clipboard connections  
<!-- Object: Clearclipboardconnections1 -->
<!-- Action: actClearClipboardConnections -->

### Clear log
![action_image_71](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Clear log  
<!-- Object: Clearlog2 -->
<!-- Action: actClearLog -->

### IDE Insight ...
![action_image_106](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Live search through IDE  
**Shortcut**: `Ctrl+.`  
<!-- Object: IDEInsight1 | Shortcut: 16574 = 16384 (Ctrl) + 190 (.) -->
<!-- Action: actIDEInsight -->

### Orthographic Splines (Auto Layout)
![action_image_108](data:image/bmp;base64,)

<!-- Object: OrthographicSplinesAutoLayout1 -->
<!-- Action: actAutoLayoutOrthoSplines -->

<!-- Object: PolylineSplinesAutoLayout1 -->
<!-- Action: actAutoLayoutPolySplines -->

## View
<!-- Object: View -->
Contains options for managing the UI layout and visibility of panels.

### Default layout
![action_image_64](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Default layout  
<!-- Object: Defaultlayout1 -->
<!-- Action: actDefaultLayout -->

### Load Layout
![action_image_15](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Load Layout  
<!-- Object: Loadlayout1 -->
<!-- Action: actLoadLayout -->

### Save Layout As
![action_image_62](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Save Layout As  
<!-- Object: Savelayoutas1 -->
<!-- Action: actSaveLayout -->

### Lock UI
![action_image_91](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Locks UI for undocking  
<!-- Object: LockUI1 -->
<!-- Action: actLockDocking -->

### SCXML View - show/hide
![action_image_59](data:image/bmp;base64,)
SCXML view - show/hide  
<!-- Object: Scxmlviewshowhide1 -->
<!-- Action: actDockPanelScxmlViewVisible -->

### Zoom Hints
![action_image_74](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Zoom hints are disabled  
**Shortcut**: `Shift+Ctrl+H`  
<!-- Object: MenuZoomHintsEnabled | Shortcut: 24648 = 24576 (Shift+Ctrl) + 72 (H) -->
<!-- Action: actEnableZoomHints -->

<!-- Object: Propertypathpanel2 -->

## Run
<!-- Object: MenuRun -->
Contains options for running and debugging SCXML projects.

### Build
![action_image_51](data:image/bmp;base64,)

**Shortcut**: `Ctrl+B`  
<!-- Object: Build1 | Shortcut: 16450 = 16384 (Ctrl) + 66 (B) -->
<!-- Action: actBuildProject -->

### Run
![action_image_10](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Runs Unit for testing  
if a flag 'Root For Run and Build' is set  
otherwise runs the current active unit  
**Shortcut**: `F9`  
<!-- Object: Run1 | Shortcut: 120 = 120 (F9) -->
<!-- Action: actRun -->

### Pause
![action_image_23](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Press 'Pause' for tracing and debugging  
If 'Pause' is pressed then StateMachine will be stopped on every 'AfterEnter' action  
**Shortcut**: `F10`  
<!-- Object: actPause1 | Shortcut: 121 = 121 (F10) -->
<!-- Action: actPause -->

### Stop
![action_image_21](data:image/bmp;base64,)
<!-- Object: Stop1 -->
<!-- Action: actStop -->

### Next step
![action_image_25](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Next step  
**Shortcut**: `F11`  
<!-- Object: Nextstep1 | Shortcut: 122 = 122 (F11) -->
<!-- Action: actNextStep -->

### Sync Invoked
<!-- Object: SyncInvoked1 -->
<!-- Action: actSyncInvoked -->

### Test Coverage
![action_image_111](data:image/bmp;base64,)
When its on, the highlighted states and transitions are not cleared during a run  
<!-- Object: estCoverage1 -->
<!-- Action: actTestCoverage -->

### Start listening from external application
![action_image_37](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Start listening from external application  
<!-- Object: Startlisteningfromexternaltester1 -->
<!-- Action: actExternTesting -->

### Scroll chart to view shape
![action_image_77](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Scroll chart to view shape in testing mode  
<!-- Object: Scrollcharttoviewshape1 -->
<!-- Action: actShapeScrollToView -->

### Set panel foreground
![action_image_76](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Set unit foreground in testing mode  
<!-- Object: Setpanelforeground1 -->
<!-- Action: actSetPanelForeground -->

### Clear all stack items
![action_image_33](data:image/bmp;base64,)
<!-- Object: Clearallstackitems2 -->
<!-- Action: actStackClear -->

### Clear entered states
![action_image_43](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Clear all entered states of active editor panel  
<!-- Object: Clearenteredstates1 -->
<!-- Action: actClearEnteredStates -->

### Clear all breakpoints
![action_image_65](data:image/bmp;base64,)
Clear all breakpoints  
<!-- Object: Clearallbreakpoints1 -->
<!-- Action: actClearAllBreakpoints -->
